channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: 'The Great Accumulation' of Bitcoin has begun, says Gemini's Winklevoss
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: With spot Bitcoin ETFs filings helping boost the price of Bitcoin, some suggest the “window to front-run institutional demand is closing.”

item.title: Atomic Wallet gives major update on hack but questions remain unanswered
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The statement is the first major update from the wallet provider since the exploit in early June, but users are still in the dark about the actual cause.

item.title: Immutable’s Gods Unchained launches on Epic Games Store
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The trading card game, which features NFT cards, will now be available to Epic Games’ 230 million customers.

item.title: Valkyrie joins rush with BTC spot ETF application to go with its futures, miners ETFs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The cryptocurrency fund manager is at least the fourth to seek a BTC spot ETF listing in the last week; Fidelity is rumored to be preparing to apply, too.

item.title: Binance, Binance.US and CZ allege SEC made ‘misleading’ statements on exchange assets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The legal motion referred to the SEC publicly claiming CZ and Binance could “commingle customer assets or divert customer assets,” despite a court transcript suggesting otherwise.

item.title: Bitcoin think tank rejects science behind ‘limited adoption problem’ paper
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The researchers claim the ideas driving the conclusions found in the original paper were based on flawed assumptions about the nature of Bitcoin.

item.title: Price analysis 6/21: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, DOGE, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin’s price surged to $31,000 as a handful of BTC spot ETF applications and Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s views on stablecoins appear to have improved crypto investors’ view of the market.

item.title: Nike teases ‘Airphoria’ NFT sneaker on Fortnite: Nifty Newsletter, June 14–20
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A project called “Ethscriptions” is bringing Bitcoin Ordinals-inspired inscriptions to the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: Wallet providers introduce BRC-20 token support despite market drawdown
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: There are currently more than 34,000 types of BRC-20 tokens in circulation.

item.title: Fed sees stablecoin as form of money, wants ‘robust’ role in its oversight, Powell says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Federal Reserve chair gave his opinion on draft crypto legislation at the House Financial Services Committee’s semi-annual Fed policy hearing.

item.title: Why is the crypto market up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Kyle White
item.category: why is the crypto market up today
item.description: The crypto market is up today as Bitcoin price returned to $30,000 and investors grow increasingly excited at the pace of new BTC ETF applications.

item.title: Three Arrows Capital founders launch new VC fund
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: "3AC Ventures is focused on superior risk-adjusted returns without leverage," the firm wrote.

item.title: US lawmakers propose bills to hold bank execs accountable for failures and address risks
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Maxine Waters did not specifically mention crypto in the proposed legislation, drafted in response to the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank, Signature Bank and First Republic Bank.

item.title: 3 reasons why Ethereum’s market cap dominance is on the rise
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Bitcoin dominance is rising, but so is Ether’s share of market dominance among its altcoin competitors. Cointelegraph explains why.

item.title: Crypto payment solution Ramp expands on-ramp service, adds support for 40 fiat currencies
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: Ramp expands its platform compatibility with 40 new currencies, including the Bermudian dollar, Costa Rican colón, Hungarian forint, Mexican peso, Singapore dollar and Swiss franc.

item.title: Bitcoin price taps $30K for first time since April
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price gains pass $30,400, marking the largest cryptocurrency’s highest levels since mid-April.

item.title: CleanSpark buys two Bitcoin mining campuses for $9.3M
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Bitcoin miner CleanSpark entered into a definitive agreement to purchase two turnkey mining campuses in the U.S. state of Georgia.

item.title: Don’t be mean to CEXs — Crypto relies on them
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Hao Yang
item.description: Centralized crypto exchanges have a crucial role left to play in bridging traditional finance with decentralized cryptocurrencies.

item.title: How to track and report crypto transactions for tax purposes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Deer
item.description: Crypto assets are subject to tax and must be tracked and reported to the IRS. This comprehensive tax guide contains everything you need to know.

item.title: Ledger releases white paper for hardware wallet seed recovery tool
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Despite facing notable criticism over the Ledger seed recovery tool, the hardware crypto wallet firm expects to launch the Ledger Recover tool in Q4 2023.

item.title: Singapore MAS proposes digital money standards with major industry players
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The Monetary Authority of Singapore, with input from major tech giants, released a white paper on the standards for the usage of digital money such as CBDCs and stablecoins.

item.title: Bitcoin adoption in Mexico boosted by Lightning partnership with retail giant
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joe Hall
item.description: “Imagine if Best Buy, Bank of America, Fox News and an NFL team were all owned by the same individual. All of them will have lightning capabilities in the future,” Jose Lemus, CEO of Ibex Mercado, told Cointelegraph.

item.title: Bitcoin 2023 in Miami comes to grips with ‘shitcoins on Bitcoin’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elias Ahonen
item.description: Shitcoins and NFTs invaded Bitcoin 2023, but most attendees didn’t seem to mind. Can Ordinals usher in a new era of Magic Internet Money?

item.title: Binance launches regulated platform in Kazakhstan amid troubles in the West
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Amid growing regulatory uncertainty in the West, several crypto platforms have shifted their focus toward the Asia–Pacific region.

item.title: Bitcoin hits $28,000 after BlackRock files for BTC ETF
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.category: Bitcoin Price Market Analysis Market Update Bitcoin Analysis Market Capitalization
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph looks at the probable causes of recent Bitcoin price action, and its market dominance reaching 50% of the total crypto market cap.

item.title: Binance SEC lawsuit could dent crypto exchange’s global plans
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The U.S. SEC is issuing a spate of regulatory actions against major exchanges, including the world’s largest digital asset exchange, Binance.

item.title: US Senator Chuck Schumer calls for ‘comprehensive’ AI legislation
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: The U.S. Senate leader plans to call for urgent bipartisan action from Congress to create “comprehensive legislation” for upcoming AI systems.

item.title: Bitcoin up 36% YoY after China warned BTC was ‘heading to zero’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Despite warning about Bitcoin’s “worthlessness,” China has apparently never prohibited its citizens from hodling the cryptocurrency.

item.title: Bitcoin ETF impulse fuels ‘fantastic’ $29K BTC price breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is “very unlikely” to leave its trip to $29,000 as a fluke spike, one popular analyst says.

item.title: Bitcoin miner Core Scientific files its Chapter 11 plan
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The bankruptcy plan explained that holders of allowed debtor-in-possession claims would receive full and final satisfaction of their claims.
